name: Loyal
descriptions: Loyal is an elder member of the Boomers at Nellis Air Force Base in 2281.

Loyal is the chief mechanic for the Nellis Air Force Base. Keeping the solar array and other key machines functioning are his primary concerns. He has lived at Nellis since his people left Vault 34. Unlike the other Boomers, Loyal seems to appreciate the Courier's help.

Loyal can be found eating breakfast in the mess hall & munitions storage from 8:00-10:00 am, then in the southern hangar of Nellis or in his house, which is the farthest to the left of the three barracks, on the back side of the two main hangars.
Loyal is named after Joshua Sawyer's grandfather, who worked as a machinist and helped form the Machinist's Union at his workplace.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Pearl sent word saying it's all right to tell you about the Lady in the water.

topics.topic_text: You don't need anything blown up?
topics.response_text: {Amused chuckle}If we need something obliterated, Raquel and the howitzer crews are more than qualified.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for ways to make myself useful.
topics.response_text: If that's so, how about you look into repairing the solar arrays on the roof of the generator building?

topics.topic_text: Raquel said you were working on some kind of weapon to fight the giant ants?
topics.response_text: I started building a sonic emitter that might do the trick, but it's useless without knowing the exact frequency that would kill the ants.

topics.topic_text: Any signal over 22,000 hertz at 150 or more decibels should do the trick.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hot damn, you're right! It's a matter of boosting across those thresholds, not exact amplitude. You're smarter than you look.

topics.topic_text: Think of it as a field test. A trial run.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] If you're willing to take the risk, be my guest.

topics.topic_text: I think I can handle a few ants without a sonic emitter.
topics.response_text: I guess you'll have to use hit and run tactics, and go see Doc Argyll if you need patching up. Good luck.

topics.topic_text: Lady in the water? What's that?
topics.response_text: A long time ago - long before the war that killed just about everything that ever lived - a bomber crashed not far from here.

topics.topic_text: Where is the bomber located?
topics.response_text: It's at the bottom of Lake Mead. I'll mark its location on your Pip-boy map.

topics.topic_text: How do you expect to raise a bomber from the bottom of a lake?
topics.response_text: Simple! Attach deployable ballast to the plane and float it on up!

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: All right. What's on your mind?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: Where is the bomber located?
topics.response_text: I told you, at the bottom of Lake Mead! I'll make sure the location is displayed on your Pip-boy map.

topics.topic_text: Tell me again what I need to do.
topics.response_text: I wish you'd paid attention the first time! All you need to do is attach the deployable ballast to the plane.

topics.topic_text: Your plan worked. The plane floated up. Seemed to be intact.
topics.response_text: That's tremendous! I'll transmit instructions to the robots to start packing up the plane to bring it back to Nellis!

topics.topic_text: I repaired the solar arrays and increased their efficiency.
topics.response_text: An impressive piece of work. I'll keep that in mind if jobs come up in the future.

topics.topic_text: Where should I look for spare parts?
topics.response_text: Ha! If we had spare parts, do you think I'd be asking you to fix the damn things? That's rich.

topics.topic_text: Maybe another time. Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Did I misunderstand what Pearl said? All right. Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: That sounds really creepy, Loyal.
topics.response_text: Ain't nothing creepy about it. It's a term of respect!

topics.topic_text: That sounds impossible.
topics.response_text: I know it does, but I tell you, it ain't! I've worked it out so it's simple!

topics.topic_text: If it's so simple, why haven't you done it?
topics.response_text: Maybe you don't understand. Hasn't been one of us, not a one, to set a foot outside Nellis in over fifty years.

topics.topic_text: All right. I'm game.
topics.response_text: Good. Here's the deployable ballast. Go find the plane, attach the ballast, and hit the button!

topics.topic_text: That's just about the stupidest idea I ever heard.
topics.response_text: No, it's not. It's the smartest idea you ever heard, but you're too stupid to know it!

topics.topic_text: Funny you should mention that, I have array parts right here.
topics.response_text: Hey, that's great! You shouldn't have much trouble getting those fixed up, then. Just stop back when you're done.

topics.topic_text: Any ideas how to get to the bottom of Lake Mead without drowning?
topics.response_text: Might try holding your breath. If that doesn't sound good enough, talk to Jack. He was working on a rebreather once.

topics.topic_text: I passed through a place called Helios One. Maybe I could find parts there.
topics.response_text: Are you talking about that damn bright light we've seen blast off to the south occasionally? I was wondering what the hell that was.

topics.topic_text: I fixed the arrays and improved their efficiency a bit too.
topics.response_text: Well, how about that! I'll have to check out your handywork.

topics.topic_text: I'll be back. I've got work to do.
topics.response_text: Be sure to stop on back and let me know when the arrays are fixed.

topics.topic_text: Can I get a code to use the VR pods in the mess hall?
topics.response_text: No. Those aren't for outsiders to use. Leave them alone.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I was just curious.
topics.response_text: Anything else you need? I've got work to do.

topics.topic_text: I'm genuinely interested in your people's history. What are the pods for?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Well, if you genuinely care so much, they're flight simulators. If you don't know our history yet, you should see Pete and get the tour.

topics.topic_text: How exactly do you plan to get the plane back here?
topics.response_text: I just told you, the robots are going to handle it. They'll break the plane down into pieces and move it up from Callville Bay in one shot.

topics.topic_text: Glad to have helped.
topics.response_text: Hey, I better get rolling. Jack and I have a lot of work ahead of us!

topics.topic_text: Are you planning to use diversionary tactics to draw their attention?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Exactly. We'll be shelling an unoccupied location in Outer Vegas to get their attention elsewhere.
